TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AdamInstance extends System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryServer

summary.span: La clase representa un servidor de instancias de AD LDS.

span.span: The class represents an AD LDS instance server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > La clase hace referencia a Active Directory Application Mode (ADAM) que se ha cambiado a Active Directory Lightweight Directory Services (AD LDS).The class refers to Active Directory Application Mode (ADAM) which has been renamed to Active Directory Lightweight Directory Services (AD LDS).

span.span: Demand value:

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void CheckReplicationConsistency() cil managed

summary.span: Invoca el Comprobador de coherencia de la información (KCC), que comprueba la topología de replicación de esta instancia de AD LDS.

span.span: Invokes the Knowledge Consistency Checker (KCC) that verifies the replication topology for this AD LDS instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Para obtener más información, vea el tema "DsReplicaConsistencyCheck" en MSDN Library en [ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).For more information, see the topic "DsReplicaConsistencyCheck" in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

param.name: disposing
param.span: Valor que determina si se deben liberar los recursos administrados.

param.span: Es si deben liberarse los recursos administrados; es si solo deben liberarse los recursos no administrados.

span.span: if the managed resources should be released; if only the unmanaged resources should be released.

summary.span: Libera los recursos no administrados que el objeto utiliza y, de forma opcional, libera los recursos administrados.

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the object and, optionally, releases managed resources.
